name: Tanah Lot Temple
notes: Best at sunset; can get crowded.

name: Uluwatu Temple
notes: Kecak fire dance at sunset is must-see.

name: Tegallalang Rice Terraces
notes: Go early morning to avoid crowds and heat.

name: Seminyak Beach
notes: Great for sunset drinks; Potato Head club nearby.

name: Nusa Penida
notes: Day trip; Kelingking Beach is iconic.

name: Ubud Art Market
notes: Bargain expected; best prices early morning.

name: Kuta Beach
notes: Good for surfing beginners; can be crowded.

name: Waterbom Bali
notes: Book online for discounts; full day needed.

name: Mount Batur Sunrise
notes: Start at 2am; guide required; bring warm clothes.

name: Besakih Temple
notes: Mother Temple; hire official guide only.

name: La Favela
notes: Great for dinner and nightlife; book ahead.

name: Canggu
description: Hip area with cafes and surf
notes: Best for digital nomads; great coffee scene.
